readable.title: 2457052334_b5a1d99048
readable.content: A boy with a red shirt climbs a large rock while a man with a red shirt helps him . A man climbing the face of a rock . a man stands at the bottom of a rock face whist another man climbs up it . a person climbing a large rock with another person on the ground helping Man helps another person reach the top of a rock they are climbing .
